title: List of all Android mp3 player  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android mp3 player  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: tuSync
repoList.description: a tool to sync an itunes library to any mp3 player like android devices

repoList.name: mp3-player
repoList.description: Tutorial Android membuat MP3 Player dengan Volley Library

repoList.name: AndroidMediaPlayerWidget
repoList.description: A simple Android widget that plays a random .mp3 file from the device's library with start-stop button

repoList.name: MusicPlayer-And-Android-App
repoList.description: • Designed and developed a music player android app which could download music list, mp3 and lyrics from server, play, pause and stop music, show image and lyrics according to the progress of music. • Using Android libraries such as Constraint-Layout, Retrofit2, Gson, RecyclerView, Glide, MediaPlayer, and some basic stuff in Android, including Intent, Service, Background Thread, AsyncTask, Handler, etc.

repoList.name: MusicLibraryApp-Android
repoList.description: A music library app with a simple and uncomplicated UI. Plays music(.mp3) files and has all the essential features you need in a Music Player!

repoList.name: SimpleAndroidMusicPlayer
repoList.description: Simple Android app to test the MediaPLayer library for implementation into another project. App simply plays and pauses a local RAW mp3 resource. It literally cannot get more simple than this.

repoList.name: Musicplayer
repoList.description: Stylish, Powerful and Fast Music Player with stylish design. Music Player allows you to quickly manage all your music files and easily supports almost any type of audio player mp3, midi, wav, flac raw AAC files and other audio formats. Easily browse and play music genres according to genres, albums, artists, songs and folklore.Features:- Plays all audio files - 5 band graphic equalizer with memory - Bass and 3D effect - MP3 editor support - Play from the rock next or previous playback - Sleep timer - Color theme select option - Singer plays according to the locale - Queue with playlist in order - Playlist support - Change album art - Tag editor support - Attractive Widget and android 4.2 lock screen playback - Library screening
